STBLKeyStringList.Text: {0.SimFirstName} has finished creating a carton of {1.ObjectName}. The carton has been added to {M0.his}{F0.her} inventory.
Brrrrr! This isn't cool, it's downright cold!
Spicy! That Dragon's Breath flavor is one sure fire way to heat the kitchen up.
Too much, too much! Ice cream isn't meant to be this hot!
Tastes like pesticide... {0.SimFirstName} has the strong desire to head outside for some sun.
These thoughts aren't {0.SimFirstName}'s own, but they're coming from inside {M0.his}{F0.her} head!
These thoughts aren't {0.SimFirstName}'s own, but they're coming from inside {M0.his}{F0.her} head!
Brrrrr! It's like the Midas touch, only cooler! Now then, who to freeze...
Ice cream, I scream, I SCREAMMMM... let's get nuts!
The perfect ice cream sundae topping & garnish selections for a perfect Sim!
Work, work, work. Clean, clean, clean. A sparkling home with the perfect sheen!
That isn't extra weight, it's fuel! Time to work out...
Eating ice cream to lose weight never tasted this good!
Ah, ice cream with a hint of roses, nature's natural aphrodisiac.
The taste, the scent of roses, the flavor of young lives!
A bottle of flavor extract. Use sparingly.

Another innovation from the bright young minds of Alpha Beta Phong Sorority! These sleek walnut cabinets come stained in a variety of colors to match your kitchen's aesthetic. The true beauty though shines through - quite literally - via the backlit frosted glass panes.

Another innovation from the bright young minds of Alpha Beta Phong Sorority! These sleek walnut counter islands come stained in a variety of colors to match your kitchen's aesthetic. The true beauty though shines through - quite literally - via the backlit frosted glass panes.

Another innovation from the bright young minds of Alpha Beta Phong Sorority! These sleek walnut counters come stained in a variety of colors to match your kitchen's aesthetic. The true beauty though shines through - quite literally - via the backlit frosted glass panes.
A delicious vehicle for delivering copious amounts of ice cream to your mouth.
A frosty receptacle for delicious ice cream.

"Burn, burn! I can't stand all of this freezer burn!" was the outcry from consumers tired of losing their time and effort spent in the kitchen to the ever-encroaching march of freezer burn. The good scientists at FutureSim Labs heard their pleas and leapt into action, developing new Burn-B-Gone tech that's now licensed to all of the major players in the kitchen appliance space.

Satisfy your sweet tooth with the Kane family's classic Ice Cream Machine. Established in 1995, the Kane's rocketed in popularity to become a household name synonymous with delicious frozen treats. While their public perception waned in 2011 due to an unfortunate incident where one of the company's truck drivers developed an unhealthy obsession with a customer; the home sales side of their business remains as strong as ever. One bite and you'll agree!
Of all the cone ceiling lamps that have made an appearance over the years, this is the official one.
This repurposed range hood makes a lovely accoutrement for your modern kitchen. Place it over your stove if you insist on being gauche.
If you want some low-risk art to hang on your walls, this mass produced print will fit the bill nicely.

Spirit Bloom Bundles - another wonderful product from the home consumer division of FutureSim Labs! Originally coveted for their pharmaceutical and chemical applications, scientists eventually found themselves with a surplus of product after enhancing their farming methodologies during the Golden Age of humanity. Pairing them with natural birch vases proved popular in providing a pop of color to sleek living spaces.
There have been many cookbooks, and many like this one even. But for those who aspire to a nicer home and lot, this is the cookbook for you.
Nicer Homes and Lots Classic Cookbook
Season harder! Your meal is no place for mercy (for your gastrointestinal tract).

Bring a pinch of pretension into your cooking with the Taste of Umami Spice Rack. The fabled fifth taste is as elusive as it is misunderstood. Impress your friends with "umami this" and "umami that" - you don't need to actually know what you're talking about as long as you speak with confidence! UMAMI!
Magnets, how do they work? The answer is actually quite inconsequential, as you'll be too busy marveling at these utensils hanging from your wall in a brazen defiance of gravity.

To win this coveted knife set, be sure that you're not a donkey, llama, alpaca, or any other beast of questionable origins. That said, if your knife skills aren't up to snuff you can always acquire it the traditional way - with cold, hard, simoleons.
These study shelves never lose their grip. From pasta to paintings, they hang onto all of your valuables and keep them secure.
The Less Is Moar® Sink made a grand splash when it debuted. Its simplicity speaks volumes, and the brushed aluminum basin fills volumes as well.

Back support is a wonderful thing, but is it necessary? Studies show that providing the slightest chair back is enough to provide the feel of back support, and a Sim's brain will naturally fill in what would have been the extra backing. Don't worry, the savings in materials is assuredly passed along to the consumer.
The Feel of Back Support Stool

Back hurting? Tired of the false claims made by the manufacturers of "The Feel of Back Support Stool"? With the Lumbar Liquidators' Dining Chair we're passing the savings (and comfort) along to YOU! We have *too much* back support and it has to GO! Buy now!

If a Sim walked into a kitchen appliance store and ordered four Four Top All Day Stoves, what should the expeditor call out to the stockroom to fulfill the purchase? Four Four Top All Day Stoves all day. Simple!
Who would design what's clearly such an oddly sized coffee table? Well… they might be giants. Fortunately, it makes a perfectly sized dining table for everyone else!
Feeling kitchen conscious? A sure fire way to a clean kitchen is to just shove the mess elsewhere, and with two shelves of storage space the Cook Book Nook has got you covered!
There is no available Ice Cream Machine
Make Fruits of the Forest Gelato
Make Mint Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
Purchase an Ice Cream Maker from Build Mode. Look for it in the Kitchen Room Sort!
Click on an Ice Cream Maker and select a recipe to prepare.
